Package com.generalnegentropics.archis.universe

Interface Summary
Catastrophe Condition that lasts a short duration and does something dramatic
Condition A condition defines some aspect of the universe relative to cells
EnvironmentalCondition An environmental condition
IOHandler An interface for classes capable of processing I/O from lifeforms.
Probe A class enabling cells to be examined every tick
RewardFunction Interface for classes providing a reward function.
 

Class Summary
Universe The Universe
 

Exception Summary
ConditionExpirationException Exception triggered by conditions to signal that they should be removed from the condition chain.
